SELECT e.ERROR_ID, e.DEVICE_ID, e.ERROR_CODE_ID, e.ERROR_MESSAGE, e.ERROR_LEVEL, e.ERROR_FLAG, e.OCCUR_AT, e.USER_MESSAGE, e.UPDATE_AT, e.DEVICE_IP, e.IF_IP_ADDRESS, d.DEVICE_NAME, g.GROUP_NAME FROM f_error_t e LEFT JOIN r_device_t d ON e.DEVICE_ID = d.DEVICE_ID LEFT JOIN r_group_t g ON d.GROUP_ID = g.GROUP_ID WHERE 1=1
AND e.ERROR_LEVEL = #{errorLevel}
AND e.DEVICE_ID = #{deviceId}
AND d.DEVICE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{deviceName}, '%')
AND e.DEVICE_IP LIKE CONCAT('%', #{deviceIp}, '%')
AND e.ERROR_MESSAGE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{errorMessage}, '%')
AND g.GROUP_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{groupName}, '%')
ORDER BY e.OCCUR_AT DESC
